resources.string: Please confirm that you want to send this request
Thank you for placing an order, We will start working on it as soon as we can
Please choose a day for pick up or drop off by clicking the icon on the left
Please choose a time for pick up or drop off by clicking the icon on the left
Please choose a store you would like to drop off by clicking the icon on the left
Please choose a day for delivery or pick up by clicking the icon on the left
Please choose a time for delivery or pick up by clicking the icon on the left
Please enter address for delivery or choose home address by clicking on the left
Please choose Pick up/Drop off date first
Wash And Fold services provided to you with a fixed price. Pick up and Delivery included

Welcome and thank you for using Washaf. You can place a new order for service by clicking on the button at the bottom of the screen or you can order for new bags by clicking on the menu button at the top left corner and choose order new bags
